docs.title: Summon Your Dream Career
docs.text:
Resume G3nius

Unlock tools, insights, and strategies for your career success

docs.title: Forge Your Path to Success
docs.text:
At Resume G3nius, we empower professionals to craft their career stories with precision and confidence. By combining cutting-edge AI tools with actionable insights, we help you unlock opportunities and thrive in today’s competitive job market.

Your journey starts here—build resumes that resonate, optimize your professional brand, and elevate your career potential.

docs.title: Your Career Toolkit
docs.text: Resume G3nius equips you with a powerful suite of tools designed to transform your professional journey:

docs.title: Tailored Resumes
docs.text: Craft ATS-friendly resumes designed to pass filters, grab attention, and showcase your value.

docs.title: LinkedIn Optimization
docs.text: Elevate your professional profile with recruiter-friendly enhancements and keyword-rich suggestions.

docs.title: Gamified Personality Insights
docs.text: Discover your professional archetype and unique strengths with engaging, data-driven profiles.

docs.title: Notebook LM Podcasts
docs.text:
Gain personalized career insights through inspiring, dynamic audio guides tailored to your journey.

Explore All Features

docs.title: Navigate Your Career Journey
docs.text: Every career journey is unique. At Resume G3nius, we equip you with tools to seize opportunities, face challenges, and unlock your potential:

docs.title: Market Insights
docs.text: Stay ahead with real-time trends, salary benchmarks, and in-demand skill data.

docs.title: Interactive Coaching
docs.text: Prepare for interviews and career pivots with tailored mock scenarios and actionable feedback.

docs.title: Achievement Badges
docs.text:
Celebrate your career growth with gamified rewards as you reach critical milestones.

Discover Our Services

docs.title: Transform Your Career with Resume G3nius
docs.text:
Your career deserves tools that empower you to shine. Whether it’s a tailored resume, an optimized LinkedIn profile, or insights to guide your next step, Resume G3nius is here to make it happen.

Visit Our Contact Page to start transforming your future today.

docs.title: Empowering Careers, One Step at a Time
docs.text: At Resume G3nius, we believe every career journey is unique and deserves tools that empower success. By combining cutting-edge AI, innovative gamification, and personalized support, we’re redefining how professionals present themselves to the world. From tailored resumes to interactive career coaching, our mission is simple: empower your brilliance.

docs.title: Democratizing Opportunity
docs.text:
Resume G3nius exists to level the playing field for job seekers everywhere. We strive to democratize access to jobs people are qualified for by breaking down the barriers between talent and opportunity. Whether it’s optimizing resumes to beat Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) or providing actionable career insights, our platform ensures that qualifications shine through.

  • AI That Empowers: Harness technology to craft resumes and profiles that connect people with the jobs they deserve.
  • Accessible Tools: We believe career growth should be available to everyone, not just a select few.
  • User-Centric Approach: Your goals are at the heart of everything we do.

docs.title: The Story Behind Resume G3nius
docs.text:
Resume G3nius was born out of founder Justin Beall’s desire to revolutionize professional branding. After serving as a combat medic, Justin transitioned into the tech industry, where he mastered problem-solving, rapid learning, and strategic thinking. These experiences revealed a critical gap in career services: tools that genuinely empower users to stand out in the job market.

Fueled by a passion for helping others succeed, Justin set out to create a platform that blends technology with storytelling, creativity, and gamification. Since its inception, Resume G3nius has transformed countless careers, helping professionals from diverse industries land their dream roles.

Fun Fact: Justin’s superpower? He’s a mimic. If he sees you shoot fire, he shoots fire.

docs.title: Our Impact
docs.text: Resume G3nius has helped over 30 professionals transform their careers, with 85% of users reporting interview invitations within 30 days. Whether it’s breaking into new industries, optimizing LinkedIn profiles, or crafting resumes that conquer ATS systems, our results speak for themselves.

docs.title: "Cloud Strife"
docs.text: "Hey Justin, the personal narrative pod is awesome! Well done, that was fun! Feel free to share and use this to demonstrate what Resume G3nius can do. I think I'd take a blend of the Pokémon character and the time-bending abilities of Claude Strifellus." — Cloud Strife, Designer

docs.title: "Tifa Lockhart"
docs.text: "Thanks to Resume G3nius, my resume finally feels like it represents my true self. The gamified personality profile was a fun way to gain insights I never thought about before." — Tifa Lockhart, Marketing Manager

docs.title: "Barret Wallace"
docs.text: "I used to dread working on my resume because I overthought every detail. Resume G3nius helped me focus on the big picture and land interviews faster than ever." — Barret Wallace, Project Manager

docs.title: "Sephiroth"
docs.text: "I liked the podcast—it did a good job of making me feel important by addressing me by name and complimenting me. A bit too much on the Pokémon stuff, though!" — Sephiroth, Creative Director

docs.title: Our Values
docs.text:
We’re driven by principles that guide everything we do:

  • Innovation: Pushing boundaries with AI, gamification, and storytelling.
  • Empowerment: Giving users the tools to own their career journey.
  • Accessibility: Making professional transformation available to everyone, regardless of background.
  • Democratization: Ensuring every qualified professional has the tools to compete for opportunities fairly.

docs.text: We're so confident in what we offer that every service is backed by a simple promise: If you're not satisfied, we’ll make it right—or you’ll get your money back. No questions asked.

docs.title: Risk-Free Career Support
docs.text: Whether you’re building a new resume, optimizing your LinkedIn profile, or exploring your next big career move, Resume G3nius is here to help. Start the conversation today—there’s no cost, and no risk.

docs.title: Unlock Your Career
docs.text: Empower Your Career

docs.title: Standard Plan
docs.text:
Perfect for Entry-Level Professionals, Recent Graduates, and Keep the Lights On

What’s Included:

  • ATS-Optimized Resume: Tailored to your target industry and role to ensure your application gets noticed.
  • Top 10 Target List: Personalized recommendations for roles and companies that align with your skills and goals.
  • One Revision: Collaborate with our team to refine your resume to perfection.

Additional Benefits:

  • No Commitment: Start your career journey risk-free—no long-term contracts or obligations.
  • Deep Discounts for Nonprofits and Those in Need: Special rates available for students, nonprofits, and individuals in financial hardship.
  • Versatile Applications: Designed to help you secure immediate opportunities, whether you're pursuing a job to keep the lights on or building toward long-term career goals.

Price: $99 Start a Conversation

docs.title: Pro Plan
docs.text:
For Mid-Career Professionals Making Strategic Moves

What’s Included:

  • Everything from the Standard Plan.
  • Human-Readable Resume: A visually polished resume tailored for recruiter reviews.
  • LinkedIn Profile Optimization: Professionally crafted headlines, summaries, and keyword integration.
  • Market Insights Report: Professionally crafted headlines, summaries, and keyword integration.
  • Two Revisions: Refine your materials with our expert feedback.
  • 15-Minute Career Discovery Consultation: Explore your career goals with a personalized one-on-one session.

Price: $249 Start a Conversation

docs.text: Looking to level up your career tools even further? Customize your plan with these powerful add-ons:

docs.text: Need more fine-tuning? Add extra revisions to ensure your materials are flawless. Price: $25 per revision

docs.title: 15-Minute Career Discovery Consultation
docs.text:
Gain clarity on your career goals with a personalized one-on-one session. Price: $125

Start a Conversation to customize your plan with these add-ons.

docs.title: Custom Solutions for Organizations
docs.text:
Looking to empower your team or elevate candidates at scale? Resume G3nius offers bulk resume optimization, LinkedIn enhancements, and tailored career services for organizations.

Key Features:

  • Bulk ATS-optimized resumes for candidate pools.
  • Team-wide LinkedIn optimization and training.
  • Gamified personality insights for team dynamics.

Start a Conversation for custom pricing.

docs.title: Our Services
docs.text: At Resume G3nius, we offer a comprehensive suite of services designed to unlock your career potential. Whether you’re pivoting to a new field, refining your professional brand, or climbing the corporate ladder, we have the tools and expertise to get you there.

docs.title: Features Overview
docs.text: Welcome to Resume G3nius's suite of AI-powered career advancement tools. Our integrated ecosystem is designed to revolutionize how professionals manage and advance their careers.

docs.title: Resume Builder
docs.text: Transform your experience into compelling resumes that get noticed. Our AI-powered system creates tailored, ATS-optimized resumes that highlight your unique value proposition.

docs.title: LinkedIn Optimization
docs.text: Maximize your professional online presence with intelligent profile optimization, content strategies, and networking recommendations.

docs.title: Personality Insights
docs.text: Understand your professional DNA with our advanced personality analysis system. Get matched with ideal roles and company cultures.

docs.title: Notebook LM
docs.text: Document and organize your professional journey with our AI-powered career notebook. Transform scattered notes into actionable career insights.

docs.title: Market Insights
docs.text: Stay ahead with real-time industry analysis, salary data, and career opportunity tracking powered by advanced AI algorithms.

docs.title: Seamless Ecosystem
docs.text:
All features work together to create a comprehensive career development platform:

  • Cross-Platform Consistency: Maintain a unified professional brand
  • Data Synchronization: Updates reflect across all tools automatically
  • Progress Tracking: Monitor your career development holistically
  • Smart Recommendations: Get AI-powered suggestions based on combined insights

docs.title: AI-Powered Advantage
docs.text:
Our advanced AI technology provides:

  • Real-Time Analysis: Instant feedback and optimization
  • Personalized Insights: Tailored recommendations for your career path
  • Trend Recognition: Early identification of career opportunities
  • Continuous Learning: System adapts to your evolving career needs

docs.title: Proven Results
docs.text:
Our users experience significant career advancement:

  • 75% faster resume creation
  • 3x increase in interview requests
  • 60% higher salary negotiations
  • 90% user satisfaction rate

Start Your Journey {: .md-button .md-button--primary }

docs.title: LinkedIn Profile Optimization
docs.text: Transform your LinkedIn presence with our AI-powered optimization engine. Stand out to recruiters and build a powerful professional network with Resume G3nius's LinkedIn enhancement features.

docs.title: Profile Analysis
docs.text:
• Headline Optimization: Create attention-grabbing headlines that increase profile views
  • Summary Enhancement: Craft compelling about sections that showcase your unique value proposition
  • Experience Optimization: Transform work history into achievement-focused narratives
  • Skills Assessment: Strategic keyword placement for maximum searchability

docs.title: Engagement Optimization
docs.text:
• Content Suggestions: AI-powered post ideas tailored to your industry
  • Networking Recommendations: Smart connection suggestions based on your career goals
  • Engagement Analytics: Track profile performance and visibility metrics
  • Activity Planning: Strategic posting schedule for maximum impact

docs.title: Technical Optimization
docs.text:
• SEO Enhancement: Optimize for LinkedIn's algorithm and recruiter searches
  • Keyword Analysis: Industry-specific keyword recommendations
  • Profile Score: Real-time scoring and improvement suggestions
  • Competitor Analysis: Compare your profile against industry leaders

docs.title: Success Metrics
docs.text:
• Average 3x increase in profile views
  • 70% improvement in connection acceptance rates
  • 2x increase in recruiter outreach
  • 85% higher appearance in search results

Optimize Your Profile {: .md-button .md-button--primary }

docs.text:

  • Salary Intelligence: Up-to-date compensation data by role and region

  • Job Market Predictions: AI-powered forecasting of career opportunities

docs.title: Career Opportunities
docs.text:
• Job Market Scanner: Real-time job market analysis
  • Company Intelligence: Detailed insights into potential employers
  • Growth Sectors: Identify rapidly expanding industries
  • Remote Work Trends: Track remote work opportunities and patterns

docs.title: Competitive Analysis
docs.text:
• Skills Benchmarking: Compare your skills against industry standards

docs.title: Comprehensive Coverage
docs.text:
• Job posting aggregators

docs.text:

Access Market Intelligence {: .md-button .md-button--primary }

docs.title: Notebook LM
docs.text: Experience the future of professional documentation with our AI-powered Notebook Language Model. Transform your career notes, ideas, and plans into actionable insights.

docs.title: Smart Documentation
docs.text:
• Intelligent Note-Taking: AI-assisted professional documentation
  • Auto-Organization: Smart categorization of career-related notes
  • Cross-Referencing: Automatic linking of related career concepts
  • Version Control: Track the evolution of your professional documents

docs.title: AI-Powered Analysis
docs.text:
• Career Pattern Recognition: Identify trends in your professional journey
  • Goal Tracking: Monitor progress toward career objectives
  • Skill Gap Analysis: Identify areas for professional development
  • Achievement Documentation: Automatically track and organize accomplishments

docs.title: Collaboration Tools
docs.text:
• Team Integration: Share and collaborate on professional documents
  • Feedback Loop: Get AI-powered suggestions for improvement
  • Export Options: Multiple format support for sharing and presentation
  • Privacy Controls: Secure sharing with granular permissions

docs.title: Career Planning
docs.text:
• Document career goals and milestones
  • Track professional development activities
  • Plan career transitions
  • Record networking interactions

docs.title: Professional Development
docs.text:
• Create learning roadmaps
  • Document project experiences
  • Track certifications and training
  • Record mentorship sessions

Start Documenting Your Journey {: .md-button .md-button--primary }

docs.title: Personality Insights
docs.text: Unlock your professional potential with our AI-powered personality analysis system. Understand your strengths, work style, and career compatibility through advanced behavioral science and machine learning.

docs.title: Professional DNA Analysis
docs.text:
• Work Style Assessment: Understand your natural work preferences and patterns
  • Communication Style: Identify your most effective communication methods
  • Leadership Potential: Discover your leadership strengths and growth areas
  • Team Dynamics: Learn how you best contribute to team success

docs.title: Career Alignment
docs.text:
• Role Compatibility: Match your personality to ideal career paths
  • Company Culture Fit: Find organizations that align with your values
  • Growth Opportunities: Identify development areas for career advancement
  • Stress Management: Understand your stress triggers and coping mechanisms

docs.title: Interactive Features
docs.text:
• Dynamic Assessments: Engaging personality evaluation tools
  • Real-time Feedback: Instant insights as you complete activities
  • Progress Tracking: Monitor your professional development
  • Personalized Reports: Detailed analysis of your professional personality

docs.title: Professional Development
docs.text:
• Career path optimization
  • Skill development prioritization
  • Personal brand alignment
  • Leadership development planning

docs.title: Team Building

  • Communication optimization

docs.title: AI-Powered Resume Builder
docs.text: Create powerful, ATS-optimized resumes in minutes with our advanced AI resume builder. Stand out to employers and pass automated screening systems with professionally crafted resumes.

docs.title: Smart Content Generation
docs.text:
• Experience Optimizer: Transform bullet points into powerful achievement statements
  • Skill Analyzer: Automatically identify and highlight relevant skills
  • Keyword Integration: Strategic placement of industry-specific keywords
  • Action Verb Enhancement: Dynamic verb suggestions for impact

docs.title: ATS Optimization
docs.text:
• Format Compatibility: Ensure compatibility with all major ATS systems
  • Keyword Analysis: Match your resume to job descriptions
  • Readability Score: Optimize content for both AI and human readers
  • Technical Validation: Check for parsing issues and formatting errors

docs.title: Design & Formatting
docs.text:
• Professional Templates: Industry-specific resume designs
  • Dynamic Layouts: Automatic space optimization
  • Brand Consistency: Maintain your professional brand identity
  • Export Options: Multiple file formats (PDF, DOCX, TXT)

docs.title: AI Analysis
docs.text:
• Job Match Score: See how well your resume matches job requirements
  • Impact Metrics: Quantify your achievements effectively
  • Industry Alignment: Tailor content to your target industry
  • Competition Analysis: Stand out from other candidates

docs.title: Version Control
docs.text:
• Multiple Versions: Create targeted resumes for different roles
  • Change Tracking: Monitor resume evolution
  • A/B Testing: Compare different versions' effectiveness
  • Automatic Backups: Never lose your progress

docs.title: Proven Results
docs.text:
Our resume builder helps achieve:

  • 80% faster resume creation
  • 3x more interview invitations
  • 90% ATS pass rate
  • 70% higher response rate
